    Submodules¶

    smol.constants module¶

    A file to define global constants that may be needed in any submodule.

    smol.exceptions module¶

    Definitions of specific exceptions raised elsewhere.

    exception NotFittedError¶

    Bases: ValueError, AttributeError

    Exception class to raise if learn is used before fitting.

    This class inherits from both ValueError and AttributeError to help with exception handling and backward compatibility.

    exception StructureMatchError¶

    Bases: RuntimeError

    Raised when a pymatgen StructureMatcher returns None.

    exception SymmetryError¶

    Bases: ValueError

    Exception for incompatibility between structure and given symops.

    Exception to raise when symmetry of a structure is not compatible with a set of given symops.

    smol.io module¶

    Input and output functions.

    Some convenience functions to save and load CE and MC workflows in a “standard” way.

    Can also at some point add input and output for other CE code packages to make it easier to translate work.

    load_work(file_path)¶

    Load a dictionary and instantiate the MSONable objects.

    Parameters

    file_path (str) –

    Returns: Dictionary with smol objects

    dict

    save_work(file_path, *msonables)¶

    Save msonable classes used in a CE and/or MC workflow.

    Save a set of unique MSONable objects used in a workflow for a cluster expansion and/or monte carlo run as a json dictionary.

    Only one of each class type can be saved per file.

    Parameters

    • file_path (str) – file path

    • *msonables (monty.MSONable) – MSONable child classes.

    smol.utils module¶

    A few random utilities that have no place to go.

    derived_class_factory(class_name: str, base_class: object, *args: Any, **kwargs: Any) → object¶

    Return an instance of derived class from a given basis class.

    Parameters

    • class_name (str) – name of class

    • base_class (obect) – base class of derived class sought

    • *args – positional arguments for class constructor

    • **kwargs – keyword arguments for class constructor

    Returns

    instance of class with corresponding constructor args, kwargs

    Return type

    object

    get_subclasses(base_class: object) → Dict[str, object]¶

    Get all non-abstract subclasses of a class.

    Gets all non-abstract classes that inherit from the given base class in a module. This is used to obtain all the available basis functions.

    progress_bar(display, total, description)¶

    Get a tqdm progress bar interface.

    If the tqdm library is not installed, this will an empty progress bar that does nothing.

    Parameters

    • display (bool) – If true a real progress bar will be returned.

    • total (int) – The total size of the progress bar.

    • description (str) – Description to print in progress bar.

    Module contents¶

    Implementats classes/functions to study configurational thermodynamics.
